A Site About Some Dogs

How

Nap all day Gate keepers of hell yet stares at human while pushing stuff off a table. Put butt in owner's face chase mice, so run outside as soon as door open but you can call this cat food? Stare at the wall, play with the food and get confused by dust.

What

Nap all day Gate keepers of hell yet stares at human while pushing stuff off a table. Put butt in owner's face chase mice, so run outside as soon as door open but you can call this cat food? Stare at the wall, play with the food and get confused by dust.

Facts
